semaglutide.description: Medication used to control blood sugar in diabetes, reduce weight, and lower cardiovascular risk in selected adults.
semaglutide.therapeuticCategories: Blood Glucose Lowering Agents; GLP-1 Agonists; Incretin Mimetics
semaglutide.synonyms: Semaglutide base; Semaglutide acetate; Ozempic®; Wegovy®; Rybelsus®
semaglutide.pharmacopoeia: Appears in USP, EP, BP, or JP depending on supplier monograph availability
semaglutide.grades: Base and acetate salt; micronized or specific purity grades on request
